page.title: 20RESCOBIE CHURCH
page.content: There has always been{Religion}at Rescobie, whether at the old church at Balgavies or at the new church overlooking the loch. This church was built in 1820 and can hold 200 people. There are 90 church{Members. }The{ {Minister}has a busy job for the church has been linked with Aberlemno and Guthrie since 1983. The services are on a rota - they may be at 10.30 a.m., 12 noon or in the evening. There is great difficulty in finding{Finance}to repair the church and the minister at Rescobie believes that if something disastrous was to happen, the church would be closed down. In order for Rescobie church and others like it to survive, more younger people are needed to replace the older ones when they can no longer work for the church.
